title: Smoked mackerel and beetroot salad
ingredients: ['200g fat-free fromage frais', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lime', '2 tsp horseradish sauce, or to taste', 'Â¼ cucumber, diced', '340g smoked mackerel fillets, skinned and flaked', '2 x 400g cans cannellini beans, drained and rinsed', '400g cooked beetroot, peeled and cubed', "100g mixed salad leaves (such as rocket, mizuna, baby spinach or lamb's lettuce)", '1 red onion, thinly sliced', 'TO GARNISH lime wedges']
